long_description: The Thule Cadence 2 Bike Trailer is easy to use and it provides a safe and comfortable ride for 2 kids, so the whole family can cruise around town and go on longer bike adventures. Trailer securely attaches to a bike using Thule patented ezHitch(TM). Easy folding for storage and transporting. Comfortably seats 2 children. Compatible with a range of accessories (not included). Extra storage space for hauling around cargo. Bicycle Trailer Kit included. Thule Cadence 2 Bike Trailer meets international safety standards.
short_description: The Thule Cadence 2 Bike Trailer is easy to use and it provides a safe and comfortable ride for 2 kids, so the whole family can cruise around town and go on longer bike adventures.
